name: allies-art-club
description: Functions as a virtual group (club) where people can follow/like our social media pages, donate funds or keep up to date with what we're doing through our website or post donations to our storage space.

scripts.dev: concurrently taskkill /IM node.exe "npm run client" "npm run start"
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc npm run test
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install && npm install --prefix client  && rm -r ./client/node_modules/jest && npm run build
